snippet: Mary Ella Hixon, the 91-year-old mayor of River Falls, Ala., is the talk of the town after pleading guilty to having stolen $201,000 in taxpayer funds over the last three years.
abstract: Mary Ella Hixon, 91-year-old longtime mayor of River Falls, Ala, is the talk of the town after pleading guilty to having stolen $201,000 in taxpayer funds over three years.
lead_paragraph: Mary Ella Hixon, the 91-year-old mayor of River Falls, Ala., is the talk of the town after pleading guilty to having stolen $201,000 in taxpayer funds over the last three years.

headline.seo: Small-Town Alabama Mayor, 91, Agrees to Repay $201,000 She Stole
headline.main: Mayor, 91, Admits Stealing From Her Alabama Town
headline.print_headline: Mayor, 91, Admits Stealing From Her Town
